results.title: Sudden cardiac death with clozapine and sertraline combination.
results.text_hl: His medical history included chronic @<m>DISEASE_Schizophrenia_Paranoid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012563 @@@paranoid schizophrenia@@@, @DISEASE_Obsessive_Compulsive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D009771 @@@obsessive-compulsive disorder@@@, @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder_Major @DISEASE_MESH:D003865 @@@major depressive disorder@@@, @DISEASE_Sleep_Apnea_Obstructive @DISEASE_MESH:D020181 @@@obstructive sleep apnea@@@, and @DISEASE_Akathisia_Drug_Induced @DISEASE_MESH:D017109 @@@akathisia@@@.

citations.NLM: Hoehns JD, Fouts MM, Kelly MW, Tu KB. Sudden cardiac death with clozapine and sertraline combination. Ann Pharmacother. 2001 Jul-Aug;35(7-8):862-6. PMID: 11485134
